meaningMnemonic: You know the words 見る and 送る by now, hopefully. Here you're "seeing" the "sending." You're seeing someone off, so this verb is <vocabulary>to see off</vocabulary>. This can also mean <vocabulary>to put off</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to pass on</vocabulary>, since it's as though you're just passively seeing someone (or something) off rather than taking action and going with them.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from the vocab words 見る and 送る. Make sure you know those and you'll know this word's reading as well.
